title: 3,000 Calories, Countless Cobbles: Deciphering the Stem Sticker Nutrition Strategies of the Tour of Flanders
content:
Crushing carbohydrate counts, meticulous caffeine dosing, smart sodium strategies were on the menu at this year's Tour of Flanders.

Read the full article at 3,000 Calories, Countless Cobbles: Deciphering the Stem Sticker Nutrition Strategies of the Tour of Flanders on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
